rules_text: Draw X cards, then call The Beast for each card you've drawn this turn. [i](You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“We either find Sevrox, or we find his pet. Either way, we win.”
—Junklord Felisah[/i]
